name: As We Wander
description: While the first photo on a roll of film might be the most freeing, the last is the most meaningful. As We Wander is a first-person experience which contemplates the relationship between photographer and space, as well as the important performative process which occurs before, during, and after shutter release. Players are left to explore at their own pace as they determine what their one and only photo from this strange landscape will be.
